name: ScienceDaily - Article Only Cleaner
description:
I am very proud to release  ScienceDaily - Article Only 1.1

This removes all content from the website except for the main article, source citation, and social bookmarking buttons. This also removes images and videos related to the article.
Science Daily - ScienceDaily.com

For best results use AdBlock Plus with this Style, I could not remove one of the ads, so it is mostly hidden.
